comment.author: Eric
comment.text: I'm afraid you're goose is cooked Hill. You will be getting exactly what you deserve! You tried to paint Trump as a racist bigot sexual predator- my daddy always said for every finger you point there's four more pointing back at you!!! #TRUMPPENCE2016!!

replies.author: Justin
replies.text: Trump goes on trial in November for Trump university fraud and in December for rape and we are talking about emails HRC didn't even send?!

replies.author: Hailey
replies.text: Justin . There is a reason you don't hear about trumps court dates. There non events. The rape trial has no merit or the news would be all over it. Even the liberal media know it's not news worthy. Now hillary is ALL over the news. Even liberal media.
